body:
You get defeated every time? Now, do not use any hacks or mods.
Try to find someone very powerful to beat.

For revenge plan, you will need:
*Powerful player
*VIP

Optional:
*Mod or Admin

Nebula:
*Iron blocks

Optional:
*Diamond blocks
*Potions

Walls:
*Higher rank
*Powerful Kit

Not allowed:
Hackers
Noobs
Bullies

title: How to get revenge if your team lose

replies.body: Thank you for an amazing topic MadTheGamer. I have learned so many things, and I really appreciate the hard work dedicated to these posts. Please continue because I'm sure the whole communites gives a shit about this thread.
